example.parse: (S (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS زار) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM عميد) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حزب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الكتلة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الوطنية)))) (NP (NOUN_PROP كارلوس) (NOUN_PROP اده))))) (CONJ و) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تشاور) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النقيب) (NOUN_PROP انطوان) (NOUN_PROP قليموس))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الشؤون)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المتصلة) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الانتخابات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الفرعية)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP المتن)))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: In matters relating to by-elections in Matn
